breast.transformationDescription: [npc.She] now [npc.has] [style.boldSquirrel(skirren)], [npc.nipplesFullDescription], and when lactating, [npc.she] will produce [style.boldSquirrel(skirren milk)]. Heh boobs.
breast.bodyDescription: On each of [npc.her] [npc.breastSize] [npc.breasts], [npc.she] [npc.has] [npc.nipplesPerBreast] skirren, [npc.nipplesFullDescription]. Breasts go boing!
breast.crotchBoobsTransformationDescription: [npc.She] now [npc.has] [style.boldSquirrel(skirren)], [npc.crotchNipplesFullDescription], and when lactating, [npc.she] will produce [style.boldSquirrel(skirren milk)]. Yay more cushions!
breast.crotchBoobsBodyDescription: On each of [npc.her] [npc.crotchBoobSize] [npc.crotchBoobs], [npc.she] [npc.has] [npc.crotchNipplesPerBreast] skirren, [npc.crotchNipplesFullDescription]. Bottom breasts go boing!
